PaymentRequestMerchantvalidation_event.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated merchantvalidation events are delivered by the Payment Request API to a object when a payment handler requires that the merchant requesting the purchase validate itself as permitted to use the payment handler.

remarks.para: Learn how the merchant validation process works.
This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
